title: For the purpose, “existing Carpet area/carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per then/ prevailing Regulation but including the areas of balcony, if allowed free of FSI as per then Regulation
clause_text: For the purpose, “existing Carpet area/carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per then/ prevailing Regulation but including the areas of balcony, if allowed free of FSI as per then Regulation.
section: 33(5)Development/Redevelopment of Housing Schemes of Maharashtra Housing & Area Development Authority (MHADA)
